item.title: 纽约市起诉社交媒体公司，指控其使儿童上瘾
item.description: 纽约市提起了一项新的诉讼，指控 Facebook、谷歌、Snapchat、TikTok 和其他网络平台让儿童沉迷于社交媒体，从而加剧了儿童的心理健康危机。【原文：New York City filed a new lawsuit accusing Facebook, Google, Snapchat, TikTok and other online platforms of fueling a mental health crisis among children by addicting them to social media.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）总裁认为美联储有可能进一步降息，并密切关注通胀情况
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）告诉路透社记者，美国联邦储备委员会今年可能会进一步降低利率，但必须在增长前景放缓与通货紧缩停滞的迹象之间谨慎权衡。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve could further lower interest rates this year, but will have to calibrate carefully between easing growth prospects and signs that disinflation is stalling, International Monetary Fund chief Kristalina Georgieva told Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道工会官员称福特 F-150 闪电工厂因铝材起火停产
item.description: 福特汽车公司下周将暂停密歇根州迪尔伯恩生产 F-150 Lightning 电动皮卡的工厂的生产，该工厂的一名工会官员称，这一变化与供应商纽约铝材工厂的一场灾难性火灾有关。【原文：Ford Motor is pausing production next week at the Dearborn, Michigan plant that makes its F-150 Lightning electric pickup, a change a union official at the plant says is related to a disastrous fire at a supplier's New York aluminum factory.】

item.title: Stoke Space 在最新一轮融资中获得 5.1 亿美元资金
item.description: 斯托克太空技术公司（Stoke Space Technologies）周三表示，该公司已在托马斯-图尔（Thomas Tull）的美国创新技术基金（US Innovative Technology Fund）主导的一轮融资中筹集了5.1亿美元，用于加快该公司 "新星"（Nova）可重复使用运载火箭的开发。【原文：Stoke Space Technologies said on Wednesday it has raised $510 million in a funding round led by Thomas Tull's US Innovative Technology Fund, to speed up development of the startup's Nova reusable launch vehicles.】

item.title: 卡尼称与特朗普就钢铝问题进行了 "思想交锋
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周三表示，他与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就钢铁和铝行业的未来进行了 "思想碰撞"。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney on Wednesday said he had "a meeting of minds" with U.S. President Donald Trump on the future of the steel and aluminum sectors, which are currently facing U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪在阿根廷推出电动汽车，拓展南美市场
item.description: 中国最大的汽车制造商比亚迪周三在阿根廷开始销售其电动汽车，利用取消电动汽车和混合动力汽车进口关税的机会，推动其在南美快速增长的业务。【原文：China's largest carmaker BYD on Wednesday launched sales of its EVs in Argentina, taking advantage of the lifting of import tariffs for electric and hybrid vehicles and boosting its fast-growing footprint in South America.】

item.title: 雪佛龙首席执行官告诉员工，预计收购赫斯的业绩将超过目标
item.description: 雪佛龙首席执行官迈克-沃思（Mike Wirth）周三告诉员工，他相信公司在收购小型石油生产商赫斯（Hess）之后，业绩将超过向投资者公开宣布的财务目标。【原文：Chevron CEO Mike Wirth told employees on Wednesday that he believes the company will outperform publicly-stated financial targets given to investors following the acquisition of smaller oil producer Hess.】

item.title: 美国加征关税，巴西9月对华牛肉出口猛增38
item.description: 巴西牛肉行业组织 Abrafrigo 周三表示，9 月份巴西牛肉对华出口同比增长 38.3%，达到 187340 吨，推动月出口总量创下历史新高。【原文：Brazil's beef exports to China rose 38.3% in September from a year earlier, reaching 187,340 tonnes, industry group Abrafrigo said on Wednesday, helping push total monthly exports to a record high.】

item.title: 谷歌将在比利时投资 50 亿欧元，创造 300 个就业岗位
item.description: 美国科技巨头谷歌（Google）周三宣布，计划在比利时投资 50 亿欧元（58.0 亿美元），并表示这将为该国再创造 300 个就业机会。【原文：U.S. tech giant Google announced on Wednesday plans to invest 5 billion euros ($5.80 billion) in Belgium, which the compay said would create a further 300 jobs in the country.】

item.title: 总统办公厅主任称巴西近期不会计划提供免费公共交通服务
item.description: 巴西总统办公厅主任鲁伊-科斯塔（Rui Costa）周三表示，政府没有计划在今年或明年取消全国范围内的公共交通票价。【原文：Brazil's presidential chief of staff, Rui Costa, said on Wednesday the government has no plans to eliminate public transport fares nationwide this year or next, a day after the finance minister had confirmed studies to assess ways to finance the sector.】

item.title: 美国航空公司称 FAA "必须 "在空中交通大修中速战速决
item.description: 据路透社周三看到的一封信称，代表美国主要航空公司的一个团体表示，联邦航空管理局必须在耗资 125 亿美元的老化空中交通管制系统大修中取得一些 "速赢"。【原文：A group representing major U.S. airlines said it is imperative the Federal Aviation Administration accomplish some "quick wins" in the $12.5 billion overhaul of the aging air traffic control system, according to a letter seen by Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: Salesforce 未来五年将在墨西哥斥资 10 亿美元推动人工智能的应用
item.description: Salesforce 周三表示，未来五年将在墨西哥斥资 10 亿美元，这家云软件提供商希望扩大其业务并推动人工智能的应用。【原文：Salesforce said on Wednesday it would spend $1 billion in Mexico over the next five years, as the cloud software provider looks to expand its operations and drive artificial intelligence adoption.】

item.title: 美国退出市场，中国需求强劲，巴西大豆出口将创纪录
item.description: 谷物出口商集团Anec周三的数据显示，截至10月底，巴西大豆出口量预计将达到1.022亿吨，超过2024年和2023年全年的出口量，这反映出没有美国竞争对手为中国进口商服务。【原文：Brazil's soybean exports are expected to reach 102.2 million tons through end-October, surpassing annual volumes for the whole of 2024 and 2023, reflecting the absence of U.S. competitors serving Chinese importers, grain exporter group Anec data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 白银升至历史新高，追随黄金破纪录的涨势
item.description: 周三，白银飙升至历史新高，搭上了黄金盘初前所未有地突破 4000 美元/盎司水平的顺风车。【原文：Silver soared to a record high on Wednesday, riding the coattails of gold's unprecedented rally above the $4,000/oz level earlier in the session.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司就前推特高管 1.28 亿美元遣散费诉讼达成和解
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和 X 公司已就包括前首席执行官帕拉格-阿格拉瓦（Parag Agrawal）在内的四名推特前高管的诉讼达成和解，他们声称在马斯克收购这家社交媒体公司并解雇他们之后，没有向他们支付承诺的 1.28 亿美元遣散费。【原文：Elon Musk and X Corp have reached a settlement in a lawsuit by four former top executives at Twitter, including former CEO Parag Agrawal, who claim they were not paid $128 million in promised severance pay after Musk acquired the social media company and fired them.】

item.title: 国际金融协会（IIF）称，新兴市场投资组合流入量降至 260 亿美元，为 5 月以来最低水平
item.description: 据一家银行业贸易集团的报告称，9 月份，外国人在新兴市场的债务和股票投资组合中仅增加了 260 多亿美元，为 5 月份以来最低，其中从中国股市流出的资金为 11 月份以来最多，这表明投资者对新兴市场心存疑虑。【原文：Foreigners added just over $26 billion to their emerging markets debt and equity portfolios in September, the lowest since May, with the largest outflow from Chinese stocks since November, signaling investor apprehension toward EMs, according to a report from a banking trade group.】

item.title: 空中客车公司前九个月交付 507 架喷气机
item.description: 空中客车公司周三表示，前九个月已交付 507 架喷气式飞机，第四季度还需交付 313 架飞机，才能实现全年交付约 820 架飞机的目标。【原文：Airbus said on Wednesday it had delivered 507 jets in the first nine months, leaving 313 more airplanes to deliver in the fourth quarter to reach a full-year target of around 820.】

item.title: 乔比航空 5.14 亿美元折价发行定价后股价暴跌
item.description: 周三，电动出租车制造商 Joby Aviation 定价 5.14 亿美元折价出售股票后，股价下跌超过 11%。【原文：Shares of Joby Aviation fell more than 11% on Wednesday after the electric air-taxi maker priced a $514 million discounted share sale.】

item.title: 阿根廷财政部努力遏制比索下滑，等待美国支持
item.description: 周三，持续的汇率压力继续拖累阿根廷的金融市场，由于与农产品出口商达成的特别清算协议收益减少，国库资金紧张。【原文：Persistent exchange rate pressures continued to weigh on Argentina's financial markets on Wednesday, straining the Treasury as proceeds from a special liquidation deal with agricultural exporters dwindle.】

item.title: 独家报道通用汽车撤回在最后一刻申请电动汽车税收抵免的计划
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors）周三表示，在9月30日联邦补贴到期后，该公司将取消一项旨在允许其经销商在数月内继续为电动汽车提供7500美元税收抵免的计划。【原文：General Motors is scrapping a program aimed at allowing its dealers to continue offering for several months a $7,500 tax credit for electric vehicles following the Sept. 30 expiration of the federal subsidy, the company said Wednesday.】

item.title: 波音公司的主要客户瑞安航空公司预计到 4 月 737 的月产量将达到 48 架
item.description: 波音公司的主要客户瑞安航空公司（Ryanair）周三表示，该公司相信美国飞机制造商将获准在今年 10 月把其旗舰机型 737 的月产量提高到 42 架，然后在明年 3 月或 4 月提高到 48 架。【原文：Major Boeing customer Ryanair said on Wednesday it was confident the U.S. planemaker would get permission to boost the monthly production rate of its flagship 737 model to 42 in October and then 48 by March or April next year.】

item.title: 停飞持续第三天，航空公司为航班延误做好准备
item.description: 由于政府拨款僵局仍在继续，美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）面临着高于正常水平的空中交通管制人员配备问题，美国各大航空公司正准备应对周三连续第三天的航班延误。【原文：Major U.S. airlines are bracing for a third straight day of delays on Wednesday as the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration faces higher-than-normal staffing issues for air traffic controllers as the stalemate over funding the government continues.】

item.title: 国际铜业协会称，产量增长放缓将使铜市场在 2026 年出现赤字
item.description: 国际铜业研究小组（ICSG）称，由于产量增长放缓，预计 2026 年全球精炼铜市场将从之前预期的 20.9 万吨盈余转为 15 万吨赤字。【原文：The global refined copper market is expected to swing to a deficit of 150,000 metric tons in 2026 from the previously expected surplus of 209,000 tons due to slower production growth, the International Copper Study Group (ICSG) said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织总裁称全球经济表现 "好于预期"，但风险依然存在
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund, 简称 "基金组织"）总裁周三表示，尽管面临多重冲击带来的严重压力，世界经济的韧性已超出预期，他预测今年和2026年全球经济增长将略有放缓。【原文：The world economy has proven more resilient than expected despite acute strains from multiple shocks, the head of the International Monetary Fund said on Wednesday, forecasting only a slight slowing of global growth this year and in 2026.】

item.title: 分析师称，铝厂火灾将给福特公司带来高达 10 亿美元的损失
item.description: 据 Evercore ISI 分析师周三发布的一份报告称，纽约一家铝厂发生火灾，预计将影响福特汽车 F-150 卡车的生产数月之久，这将使该汽车制造商的盈利减少多达 10 亿美元。【原文：A fire at a New York aluminum plant that is expected to affect production of Ford Motor's F-150 truck for months will sap up to $1 billion from the automaker's earnings, according to a Wednesday note from Evercore ISI analysts.】

item.title: 阿根廷取消铝、钢及其衍生产品出口税至年底
item.description: 根据官方公报公布的一项决议，阿根廷政府暂时取消了铝、钢及其衍生产品的出口税，直至 2025 年底。【原文：Argentina's government temporarily eliminated export taxes on aluminum, steel, and derivatives until the end of 2025, according to a resolution published in the official gazette.】

item.title: 思科推出旨在远距离连接人工智能数据中心的芯片
item.description: 思科系统公司周三推出了一款新的网络芯片，旨在连接人工智能数据中心，微软和阿里巴巴的云计算部门已成为该芯片的客户。【原文：Cisco Systems launched on Wednesday a new networking chip designed to connect artificial intelligence data centers, with the cloud computing units of Microsoft and Alibaba enrolling as the chip's customers.】

item.title: 瑞银审查 5 亿美元 First Brands 风险敞口对基金的影响
item.description: 瑞银集团周三表示，正在研究 First Brands 破产对其几只投资基金的影响，这家瑞士银行在这家倒闭的美国汽车零部件供应商身上的风险超过 5 亿美元。【原文：UBS said on Wednesday it was examining the impact of the bankruptcy of First Brands on several of its investment funds, with the Swiss bank exposed to the tune of more than $500 million to the collapsed U.S. auto parts supplier.】

item.title: 国际航空运输协会（IATA）会长称美国停摆不会造成航班严重中断
item.description: 航空公司游说团体国际航空运输协会（IATA）总干事威利-沃尔什（Willie Walsh）周三表示，美国政府关门并未严重影响国内商业航班，也没有阻止新空中交通管制员的招聘。【原文：The U.S. government shutdown hasn't significantly disrupted domestic commercial flights nor has it stopped the recruitment of new air traffic controllers, Willie Walsh, director general of airline lobby group IATA said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 杰富瑞披露 7.15 亿美元基金受 First Brands 破产影响
item.description: 投资银行杰富瑞（Jefferies）周三披露，其旗下的卢卡迪亚资产管理公司（Leucadia Asset Management）基金持有约 7.15 亿美元的应收账款，这些账款与破产的汽车零部件制造商 First Brands 集团有关。【原文：Investment bank Jefferies disclosed on Wednesday that its Leucadia Asset Management fund holds about $715 million in receivables linked to bankrupt auto-parts maker First Brands Group.】
